Name: SharePoint Farm
Description: Creates a highly available SharePoint farm on Windows Azure IaaS.

Parameters.Name: Region
Parameters.Description: Azure region to which the infrastructure will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: AffinityGroup
Parameters.Description: Azure affinity group to which the infrastructure will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: VnetName
Parameters.Description: Azure Virtual Network for setting up highly available SharePoint 2013 farm.

Parameters.Name: DiskStore
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure storage account for creating VM disks.

Parameters.Name: ADCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service to which Active Directory VMs are to be deployed.

Parameters.Name: FQDN
Parameters.Description: Fully qualified domain name for setting up active directory in the specified Azure Virtual Network.

Parameters.Name: Domain
Parameters.Description: NetBios name of the domain configured in the specified Azure Virtual Network.

Parameters.Name: ADVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the Active Directory VMs.

Parameters.Name: SQLAGCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service.

Parameters.Name: ClusterName
Parameters.Description: Name of Windows Failover Cluster (on top of which SQL Availability group will be created). This has to be unique in the domain(setup within the virtual network).

Parameters.Name: AvailabilityGroupName
Parameters.Description: Name of SQL Server Availability Group. This has to be unique in the domain(setup within the virtual network).

Parameters.Name: DatabaseName
Parameters.Description: Name of the database which is to be added to the SQL Server Availability Group.

Parameters.Name: NumberOfSQLNodes
Parameters.Description: No of SQL nodes. A minimum of two are required to create SQL Server Availability Group.

Parameters.Name: SQLVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the SQL VMs.

Parameters.Name: QuorumVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the Quorum VM.

Parameters.Name: SharepointCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service.

Parameters.Name: AppServerCount
Parameters.Description: No of SharePoint App servers to be deployed.

Parameters.Name: WebServerCount
Parameters.Description: No of SharePoint web servers to be deployed.

Parameters.Name: SharepointVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the SharePoint VMs.

Parameters.Name: AdminName
Parameters.Description: Name of local administrator account.

Parameters.Name: AdminPassword
Parameters.Description: Password of local administrator account.
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: DSRMPassPhrase
Parameters.Description: Safemode Password for domain
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: SqlAdminPassword
Parameters.Description: Password for SQL sa account.
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: SqlSvcAccountName
Parameters.Description: Name of SQL service account.

Parameters.Name: SqlSvcAccountPassword
Parameters.Description: Password of SQL service account.
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: FarmAdminName
Parameters.Description: Name of sharepoint farm administrator account.

Parameters.Name: FarmAdminPassword
Parameters.Description: Password of sharepoint farm administrator account.
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: FarmPassphrase
Parameters.Description: Safemode Password for sharepoint farm
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.
